auth.title: Request login token
auth.description: Provide your e-mail address to get a login mail

fetch_password.title: Validate login
fetch_password.description: Check your mailbox and click on the link from Zonneplan. After that click button here

abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})

error.failed_to_request_login: Failed to request login link (check logs)
error.no_password: No password received yet (did you follow the link from the email?)
